text-snippet.content:
Member Disputes.

You are solely responsible for your interactions with other Members of the Services.
Ookla reserves the right, but has no obligation, to monitor disputes between you and other Members and to take action (e.g., account deletion or removal of content posted by a user) if Ookla determines that there has been a violation of the Agreement or if such action is otherwise necessary or desirable, in its sole discretion.
